description:
This is the Nightmare's first match with a wrestler NOT ranked in the top 3.
The Nightmare has beaten some of the best US has to offer. The Brawler is feisty and hates losing. She will battle till the end, however all the fighting and struggling in the world will not save her from a brutal fucking in RD4. This match is a leg scissors fan, dream come true.
title: The Nightmare (3-0)
